text: do you guys want a really fresh
delicious salad to serve at all of your
summer picnics and barbecues how about
this cucumber dill salad start off with
Kirby cucumbers I like them because you
can cut them and keep the skin on and
its really great just give them a scrub
beforehand cut them in half lengthwise
and then go ahead and slice them thinly
crosswise your the great thing about
Kirby's is the seeds are really small
and they're not too watery so you can
leave those in I often remove the seeds
of cucumbers because I find that they
water out especially in salads if
they're going to be sitting around for a
while and I really don't like that my
daughter Mikayla gets really mad because
she loves the cucumber seeds so now what
I do is I take them out but I give them
to her so I put them in a little bowl
for her it's been a while since I've
done that so that was for Kirby
cucumbers set those aside for a sec the
dressing is a sour cream dill dressing
button Trop up a little bit of dill and
save a little bit of dill for garnish if
you want it to look pretty in the end
about two tablespoons I love it
it's really fresh if you don't like dill
try parsley try cilantro try mint those
are my suggestions sour cream this is
reduced fat you want it reduced fat you
can use reduced fat if you want it full
fat go ahead and use that go crazy lemon
juice a couple tablespoons add your two
tablespoons of dill season with salt and
pepper
and then add the cucumbers and toss in
voila
it's cucumber salad you know what you
could put in this which I really like
kind of crazy a little bit of sliced or
shredded apple have I ever done that
before because I really love cucumbers
in a creamy sauce with apple that's it
it's done I feel like if you wanted to
serve this at a party you would probably
want to double it because it doesn't
make that much and you're gonna want to
eat it all up yourself right away mmm
mmm rungy it's tangy and has that waffle
dill in it it doesn't get any better
than this cucumber dill salad
you
you
